snippet: The U.C.L.A. Bruins were never seriously threatened after they scored five runs in the first inning against the Seawolves ace Tyler Johnson.
abstract: Stony Brook is routed by UCLA, 9-1, in the team’s inaugural appearance in baseball's College World Series.
lead_paragraph: The U.C.L.A. Bruins were never seriously threatened after they scored five runs in the first inning against the Seawolves ace Tyler Johnson.

headline.seo: College World Series — Stony Brook Trounced in Opener
headline.main: U.C.L.A. Trounces Stony Brook in Series Opener

keywords.value: State University of New York at Stony Brook
